info.title: Navigate forwards to a grid in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeGrid
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the grid
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the grid
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Navigate to the first column header in the grid.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first column header in the grid.
instructions.mode: Ensure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
Coordinates of the column header (column 1, row 1) are conveyed
